---

# serializeValidationConfig

Serializes a `ValidationConfig` object into a 26-byte hex string.

## Import

```ts
import { serializeValidationConfig } from "@account-kit/smart-contracts";
```

## Usage

```ts
const config = serializeValidationConfig({
  moduleAddress: "0xAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAA",
  entityId: 1234,
  isGlobal: true,
  isSignatureValidation: true,
});
```

## Parameters

### config

`ValidationConfig`
The validation configuration to serialize

## Returns

`Hex`
A 26-byte hex string representation of the validation configuration
